summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ForaTask management application. All major pages load correctly, user authentication works for multiple roles (Admin, Supervisor), and core UI functionality is operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Application redirects to login page when accessing protected routes directly after some time
ui_bugs.note: This may be expected security behavior

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with correct user info and stats - PASSED
Tasks page with tabs and filters - PASSED
Attendance page with calendar and monthly stats - PASSED
Chat page with messaging interface - PASSED
Employees page showing employee list with roles - PASSED
User profile and role display correctly - PASSED
Add Task button accessible from dashboard - PASSED
Task tabs (All Tasks, Assigned to Me, Created by Me, Viewing) - PASSED
Attendance stats (19 Working Days, 1 Present, 18 Absent) - PASSED
action_item_for_main_agent: All core frontend functionality is working correctly. The application successfully loads all major pages, user authentication works for multiple roles, and the UI is functional. Consider testing Employee login flow and Add Task form submission for complete coverage.
